channel.title: Introducing NEW crown
channel.description: im wanting to add a crown for playerRights 8 like Blurr's client has.. but a dif client than his since i dont like his much... i have tired folowing these tuts but none say about adding a NEW crown to the existing ones that i could find.. how can i add a new crown with the title of it KenIcon.png? ive already got it drawn up and stuff[br][br][size=1]Posted on: June 02, 2009, 01:02:27 pm[/size][hr]so honestly NOBODY knows how in the 14 people that looked? i have use Z-FileSearcher on blurrs client to find the icon but it comes up with nothing.. so i know its possible and there are plenty of people that can.. just HOW...

item.title: Introducing NEW crown
item.dc:creator: @CoonHunter CoonHunter
item.description:
@CoonHunter wrote:

im wanting to add a crown for playerRights 8 like Blurr’s client has… but a dif client than his since i dont like his much… i have tired folowing these tuts but none say about adding a NEW crown to the existing ones that i could find… how can i add a new crown with the title of it KenIcon.png? ive already got it drawn up and stuff[br][br][size=1]Posted on: June 02, 2009, 01:02:27 pm[/size][hr]so honestly NOBODY knows how in the 14 people that looked? i have use Z-FileSearcher on blurrs client to find the icon but it comes up with nothing… so i know its possible and there are plenty of people that can… just HOW…
